channel.title: What are your favorite Super Nintendo games?
channel.description:
What are your favorite Super Nintendo games? MIne are...
Donkey Kong Country 1 and 2 - I beat the first one today! :) Strike Gunner Super Mario World Super Mario All Stars Super Mario Kart Metroid Prime Looney Toons BBall Bugs Bunny in Rabbit Rampage Chrono Trigger Final Fantasy 3 Frogger Street Fighter Tiny Toons Adventures - Buster Busts Loose Yoshi's Island
What are your favorite SNES Games?
Here is a huge list of them: (1026 listed) http://www.emureactor.info/roms/systems_list.php?trim=all&s=Super%20Nintendo
If you still don't know about emulators, roms, or how to play old games on your computer. View this guide. http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,2207.0.html
~Ron :D

item.title: What are your favorite Super Nintendo games?
item.dc:creator: @Ron Ron
item.description:
@Ron wrote:

Hey thanks Tarantula. I forgot about Lion King. I got so far in that game. I got to the part where there were four volcano like things and all they did was shoot lava up. That way way later after he became an adult, but I never knew what to do.

So close to beating the game.

I haven’t played 007 James Bong on SNES either. That may be fun to try.

[quote=“james, post:12, topic:8986”][quote author=XxKanexX link=topic=12815.msg146950#msg146950 date=1155364281]
I just downloaded the emureactor thing and played Yoshi’s island and some others. Yoshi’s island started pissing me off though, so i stopped playing that.

Thanx’s for sharing the find. It fills in the bordom times. <3
[/quote]
there are emulators for every game console just google it :P[/quote]
Ya emulators now work for every console except PS3, Xbox, and Xbox360. Only 1 xbox emulator can play Halo, but barely, and can’t play any other game.

Read full topic
item.source: What are your favorite Super Nintendo games?

item.title: What are your favorite Super Nintendo games?
item.dc:creator: @Tarantula Tarantula
item.description:
@Tarantula wrote:

I have real Super Nintendo console! <3

My favourite games (All what i have, i love them all):

  1. Super Mario World 2 - Yoshi’s Island
  2. Super Mario World 1
  3. Super Mario - All Stars
  4. Donkey Kong Country
  5. Lion King <— That kick ass!
  6. F-Zero <— My first Super Nintendo game ever! (Came with console)
  7. Super Soccer
  8. NHL 95 <— This really owns all NHL games!
  9. Street Fighter II Turbo
  10. Turrican
  11. Tim In Tibet
  12. Secret Of The Stars
  13. Vortex <— Still have no idea how to play this shit

Read full topic
item.source: What are your favorite Super Nintendo games?
